entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
